ValidationRule.description: Is this an Enterprise Agreement? field in MS page layout is required for Sales users
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Is_this_an_Enterprise_Agreement__c , ""), OR(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "GBL EMEA Sales Mgr"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "GBL EMEA Sales Rep"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "GBL Sales Manager_CEO"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "GBL Sales Mgr"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "GBL Sales Rep"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "JPN Sales Mgr"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "JPN Sales Rep"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "GBL Sales Operation Support"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "GBL KACE ASR"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "GBL Dell Services Mgr"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "GBL Dell Services Rep"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "MSG Service Sales"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Services Solution competency Profile - Non SSO")), S_P_Vendors_Name__c = "Microsoft", Customer_Name__c <> "", DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATE(2013,3,4) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Is this an Enterprise Agreement?‚Äù field must be specified
